title: Gourmet Garden Cafe & Juices
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Catering, Fusion, Spanish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers a wide selection of clearly labeled vegan, gluten free, vegetarian and organic choices, including juices, smoothies and much more. All food is low in salt, prepared fresh to order and almost everything is made-in-house, including dressings, soups, granola & trail-mix. Does not use fryers or microwaves.
